summary: Implemented comprehensive Beauty Booking module integration into unified customer dashboard. Created CustomerDashboardService with optimized queries and caching, DashboardController with AJAX endpoints, main dashboard view with all beauty widgets (stats, charts, activity feed, bookings, packages, gift cards, loyalty, consultations, reviews, retail, wallet), navigation menu, and quick actions. All views conditionally display based on module status. Added routes and error handling.
current_status: All core implementation completed. Dashboard shows beauty statistics, widgets, charts, and navigation when module is active. Graceful degradation when module is disabled. Ready for testing.
